content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our front porch when i noticed a bright light hovering in sky between two stars. my wife said "it's just a star." but it was changing colors and hovering. i went and got my binoculars and you could clearly see a bright white main light with red, blue, green, and yellow lights rotating or flashing in sequence. we watched it for about thirty minutes and went inside. i went back out at about 11:20 and lights were gone. it was not an airplane or helicopter. i'm glad i saw it and even more happy my wife saw it also.
content.summary: Sitting on porch noticed light in sky looked through binoculars could see lights rotating

content.detailedDescription:
My alarm went off at 5:00 a.M.  i put on some clothes because the dogs had to go to the bathroom.  i turned on the deck lights and the spots and brought them down to the landing, opened the gate door, and they went down the rest of the way to go to the bathroom.  i a always looking up into the night sky and when i looked up i saw a neon green circle.  it was a little fuzzy so i reached for my glasses thinking they must be on the top of my head, but i had them on.  i reached for my phone to get a picture but by the time the camera came up, the circle had faded.  3 out of the 4 dogs came back within a couple of minutes.  the 4th one who is a wanderer i could hear barking but it sounded like she was on the other side of the woods.  she never goes into the woods in the dark.  i just happened to look up again and the neon green light was back.  i got my phone again and took a couple of pictures, but i couldn't see the green light on my camera screen.  i took a couple of pictures where i thought the light was but they didn't come out...Just black.  my camera needs to focus on something before it takes a picture and i thought it weird that it took a picture of something not on the screen.  the light faded again.  the photos are just black.  i kept calling and calling the dog, and about 2 minutes later she came flying back, she ran around the house and started barking on the other side of the house.  i finally had to go get the dog because she wouldn't come to me.  i never saw what she was barking at.

i went back in the house and fed the dogs and got ready for work.  when i left at 6:00 a.M., i let the dogs out onto the deck because a friend was going to come over and take them for a walk this morning.  all of the dogs immediately ran around the deck to the other side of the house and started barking...But i couldn't see what they were barking at.  i left and went to work.
content.summary: Neon green glowing circle that faded.  came back within a minute and faded again

content.detailedDescription: These photographs were published on a honduran newspaper <el tiempo> on august 24, 2014. it says this happened on the 23rd at 5.30 pmtiempo.Hn/portada/.../aseguran-haber-visto-un-ovni-en-puerto-cortes
content.summary: Disc shaped

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside my house at rear for a cigarette.  always have habit at looking at night sky to spot the constellations.  i saw a red, dome shaped or ball shaped, glowing object to the ne.  it was stationery.  thought it was a helicopter, hovering.  it was pulsating somewhat.   i kept looking at it.  it made no sound,  it was a long distance up in the night sky.  after about 10 minutes, it suddenly, rapidly took off a tremendous speed and disappeared into the night sky, travelling ne.  i knew, then, positively, it was not a helicopter or any kind of aircraft( am used to seeing these as we live near dublin airport).

i felt overjoyed at seeing this object.  i wanted the craft to land so i could go to it and meet the occupants.  i have been interested in ufos since i was a child.  over the years( now aged 62) i went from strong believer to sceptic and then back again to believer.  i have been reconverted by bill birnes on ufo files on sky tv.  the evidence seems to be overwhelming.  so many credible people have witnessed these objects and it is being covered up by all governments.  if they tell us they are real and there are alien entities, the whole world structure of beliefs will collapse and they fear this as it will lead to total pandemonium.

to me, having alien neighbours, from where ever they are in the universe, is a wonderful reality.  it goes to uphold beliefs, not destroy them and shows that life is persistent and dominant.

we are primitive hominid, primates and we have very small brains and we have only been here on earth, in our present homo sapiens, sapiens form for 95,000 years- a blink of an eye in the age of the universe.

the truth is here- now.

sincerely

[name, address, and email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Looked up at night sky.  saw a red, glowing object hovering.  stared at it.  thought it was an aircraft & it then took off at huge speed.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife: "when i looked up i thought i saw the moon , it was a hazy white sphere surrounded by a blood-red ribbon of color that continnually shifted in size and shape, as if circling around the white center"
me:"mt first it looked like the moon, then i realized it was moving (seemingly towards us), rather it was turning and getting larger. there was a saturn-like spiral moving counter-clockwise from the edge of the dark hole-like circular middle portion.Originally it had a moonlike apopearance then changed to a saturn-like appearance. it got bright, then faded, then seemingly re-appeared again fainter after about 30 seconds or so."

i wouldnt be surprised if hundreds of people saw it as it was the beginning of the early morning commute time, ~5:10am est

my wife saw it too.
content.summary: Spiral porthole opening then disapating happened twice in same place in sky

content.detailedDescription:
So, i'm not new to mufon.Com at all, and i actually had made a report a couple years ago that affected me enough to want to tell someone and make it official.

the other day, i was out smoking a cigarette on my porch, and had a clear view of the night sky. i noticed what appeared to be a star that was moving in the sky. it moved at a pretty quick pace, equivalent to most airplanes or slightly faster. it was a solid bright light that was not blinking at all like a plane would be.

i questioned to myself, "is that a ufo or what?", and as i said that to myself, i saw a shooting star right where i was focusing on. of course, shooting stars are not something that is unexplainable, but the fact one occurred right near the starlike object as i was asking that question to myself seems like more than a coincidence to me, especially since i don't quite believe in them. 

anyway, back to the starlike object.  it kept moving in a north eastern manner, and i watched it for a good 20 seconds or so before i noticed two air planes with red and white blinking lights moving much faster than most commercial flights do approach from near the tail end of this starlike object.  they were not very close, as the starlike object kept flying in the direction it was before it just "faded out" and basically "disappeared".

i watched the two planes, which by the way were flying parallel to each other, and noticed that one of the planes did a full u-turn in the air and started heading back the direction it came from, and the other plane cut off to the "right" and flew that direction.  i am really confused as i have never seen any airplanes do any turns in the sky over pennsylvania, especially paired with another aircraft that appeared to be the same type.  

these planes were flying quite fast, and the reason i know is because shortly after this ufo disappeared, i saw a third plane that really appeared to be a commercial flight that had different blinking lights and flew much slower than the other two planes, acting as a benchmark for normal plane speeds in my mind at the time.

i have not really stopped searching for ufo related sightings since my last report on mufon years ago, but this particular event really has sparked my interest in the existence of extra terrestrials even more as of the past couple weeks and i am really hoping we finally get to declassify all the documents and knowledge we really know about the subject as a whole.

my honest intuition feels like those planes were trying to chase down a ufo because they flew pretty much right in the air space and direction it was headed... and have any of you ever seen a plane do a complete u-turn and fly back the exact way it came, while another air plane flys off to the right? and add in the shooting star........You decide.

thank you for reading.
1 step closer.
content.summary: Saw a starlike ufo then saw two airplanes follow, one turned around completely after object disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Bright round green light that went very fast and curved not a straight but took a curved track as it went over the mountain.
content.summary: Just looked up dont know it it had already been moving or just started it went so fast and across and downward and curved before  i lost view because the mountains in this area.

content.detailedDescription: Bright green flying sphere.  never saw anything like it!!
content.summary: Bright green oval shaped

content.detailedDescription:
about 20 minutes before the event i was sitting on the back porch and smoking a cigarette while sharing a snack with a friend. we were discussing the odd ufo events of the previous night (see my previous mufon report). i was also telling her about the low and peculiar cloud cover that seemed unique and persistent. the tone was one of suspicion and concern. 

 i looked up, and just over to my left. after almost three months consistent activity (every night with exception to those with a full moon, heavy cloud cover, heavy rain) i see this thing. for just a second i paused to making sure i wasn't hallucinating, and then i pointed out the small uav/drone type ufo to my friend. this object was white and shiny like a new car, and it had a black stripe across the middle. in my estimation, it was approximately 4 foot in length, and had a diameter of 4-6 inches. i did use trees and structures for scope. my friend disagrees with my observation on its size. she believes the ufo to be 8 feet in length (+/-) but agrees that it is too small for a person to pilot. it looked exactly like a common pain relief/supplement capsule (gelatin/gel cap) even bearing such a pill's segment. that segment is where the +/- 6 inch black stripe was located. the object was flying in a perfectly straight direction while maintaining its altitude like a lead weight cutting through water. 

 we both instantly became a little nervous and used a few expletives while asking each other what this ufo could possibly be. i've never heard of such a thing, nor had she. it came from the south and flew north. both myself and the other witness lost sight of it in the distance. it was not moving very fast, but it was impressive nonetheless- given its size, lack of visible propulsion/fuel exhaust. we could not agree on its altitude or exact size. we do agree that it was too small to be anything other than a uav/drone. 

my gut tells me it is a new government or military scouting device that is propelled by antigravity technology. my theory is that it is fitted with technology and software used to "sniff" out or particular elements and complex chemicals associated with nuclear, explosive, or illegal narcotics. i had read a report of us military drones being fitted with explosive detecting devices a short while back and being used in the middle east. i doubt that such drones could be used at home domestically without upsetting/intimidating everyone. on its own, and given the lack of informed minds here and abroad regarding technology and the sciences, a ufo we saw did not look like it could harm people. fort campbell and the doe's oak ridge facilities are not that far away. oak ridge reportedly is using their facilities to build the new motors credited to tesla motor co. for myself, this type of thing is a natural/obvious progression of such an equation.

just a note

late last night, i noticed numerous ufos with the same witness as above. these objects were typical in size, shape, and lighting. what i see almost nightly from my home: triangles, disc, orbs, flash. there were two exceptions to what has become the norm that i can note. we heard what seemed like a helicopter, but i could only narrow down a very general direction (se) because the sound was so muffled. it seemed to fool my senses regarding distance, and altitude to full effect. the other thing i am uncertain about. roughly between orion's belt and the pleades constellations the was one of two solid objects. the other similar object was directly in front of the pleades. the both seemed to be a burnt cherry red, very large, and using some sort of light refracting device. i could only find binoculars to see them a bit better, but for those that stargaze, you know what the pleades looks like to the naked eye, and it was all wrong last night. of course, my placement of these objects in the night sky is in relation to my location and time.

again, i would love for someone to come out here and record/document all of this. this small area is a hotbed for activity. i am anticipating an email or call.
content.summary: White, segmented capsule with black stripe flew in a straight line just overhead. possible uav type ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I went out onto my deck about 8pm, looked up at the stars. one was moving. thought it may be clouds passing over causing me to see movement that wasn't there. i turned off the porch light and took a seat. the brightest the star out tonight was moving erratically. i called my daughter to come see we watched it for a while and decided to go online to see if anyone else was watching. since this is my first time spotting a ufo i didn't know where to go and i didn't want to appear as a “kook” on twitter. we went back out at 9:00 and 10:30 and it’s still moving around.
content.summary: Saw a bright object overhead, thought it might be a star, then i saw that it was moving erratically.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my lanai, i enjoy the evening and smoke my cigarettes. i am always looking at the stars and all around. i was looking straight in the direction the objects came from below the tree level i can see. i saw a bright yellow orange egg shaped light from top of the trees and homes go in an upward sw direction on an angle. no noise, it traveled fast in a angle toward the sky. i watched for about 4.5 minutes until it seemed to slow and a reddish light seemed to blink for about 30 seconds and then it disappeared. just then another bright yellow orange light followed into the same exact path, did the same exact colors and was the same size, for the same amount of time, then it disappeared. i have never witnessed anything like that before. i have seen many planes fly over my house all of the time with rsw airport in ft. myers, fl. there were no planes in the sky during these 10 minutes, i intentionally looked after seeing these bright objects take off from nowhere.
content.summary: 2 yellow orange egg shaped from the tree line asend on after the other.

content.detailedDescription:
While reviewing our vacation photos taken in glenwood springs, co, my husband and i noticed a strange object in one of our photos. 
the photo was taken on 8/24/2014 at 4:07pm while we were standing on the south side of the foot bridge that spans the colorado river in glenwood springs, co.
we did not notice the object at the time we took the photo and we do not remember hearing any sounds of aircraft.
content.summary: Seen on photo.

content.detailedDescription:
I am being followed by extraterrestrials on this terra in cloaked craft hovering in other dimensions while we discuss the future of my planet, this ball of earth. they are in cloaked craft hovering about or walking, in another dimension, interacting with me in this dimension. i am the supreme commander of the intergalactic alliance, also known by the egyptians as bennu amun-re or half of the lord of the universe. we are looking to acquire access to my craft that have crashed here on earth while i execute secondary procedure on this planet.
i am absolutely serious, this is not a joke. my wife is the sentient being that exists as their mothership onboard computer system sentient hardware abstraction layer. don't make this public. i want to talk to ufologists about this.
content.summary: Cloaked multidimensional craft and beings following me on a daily basis

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north when i seen a military plane flying straight toward me..It was flying almost as low as a crop duster would..I was scared to death..I thought it was either going to crash or land on the highway...I slowed my speed to 10 mile an hour watching this plane...Then it made a large circle to my right and started to ascend and head north..I leaned over in my seat and took a picture of the plane on my cell phone....I didnt think i got the picture because i was so freaked out i was shaking...So..Today i was looking at my gallery pictures and seen the picture of the blue sky and thought well i guess i didnt get the picture...I took my fingers and pinched to enlarge it and i seen the military plane..Along with a sauser type dark object and 2 white objects with a red and green lights....I have tried to come up with any reasonable conclusion to what all these things are but cant....Could this be ufo's
content.summary: After viewing a picture i had taken..I seen the ufo

content.detailedDescription:
My sighting was in june 2008
around 10am
in cherry hill nj

i was sitting at traffic light on rt 73w in front of the bmw dealer.

the philadelphia airport brings planes in holding pattern over that area so i 
was watching a plane fly over head. 

directly behind the plane was a white ball. perfectly round.
maybe 50ft behind the plane. 

the ball was about the same hight as the back of the plane, maybe 35ft in 
diameter. 

it flew perfectly behind the plane until the plane banked to the left and the 
ball banked to the right and went over philadelphia.

i looked at the lady in the car next to me and she was just staring at it. so 
she saw it also. 

the traffic light went green and the orb was out of view. 

odd. i never shared this story.
hopefully it corresponds with someone else's story.
content.summary: Orb followed a plane then cut off to the west

content.detailedDescription:
Om monday the 12 or 16th of may, 2014, subject was outside at 7pm.
witness looked up and saw a hovering blueish lite orb hovering in the sky.
the craft was circular and shiney with an outer ring in the center that was blueish.
witness said a plane at a lower elevation flew under it and a passenger plane flew at 25 thousand to 30 thousand feet over it.
witness laid on the ground to change his view of the object and thinking he might be able to identify the orb.  he ruled out a weather balloon and could think of no other thing it could be. witness watched the orb for 10 minutes and when witness went in house to get a camera and came back out the orb/craft was gone.
content.summary: Saw hovering blueish light in the ne sky hovering above the flight path of passenger aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Ok so i have been really skeptical about ufo's or anything of that nature, but today was different. 

i sit on the porch with my 13th month old at night. this is something just me and him do together. we were sitting there looking at the airplanes because we live down the road from charleston, international airport. i just so happened to be following one of the planes and an object caught my eye. my wife knows i am interested in things of this nature and i did not want to see this alone. i opened the door and called my wife over and she verified what i was seeing. i watched it for about 10 mins along the sky thinking it could be a star and light could be bouncing off the different levels of atmosphere, but the more i focused on it the more i could see a solid object the same color as the sky just a fraction of darker blue. at one time the object flashed one really bright white light while continuing on its path. i could have just witnessed a star or a balloon, but it was possibly 1 1/2 miles away and visible. i have a short video on my phone, but it sux like every other video on the internet.
content.summary: Object with red light floating and rotating in the sky while moving east to south

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in my yard talking to my neighbor, we tend to look up. we saw a lit up craft traveling northeast at a fast velocity. then by my fence facing south above a large tree on the corner of my eye as my neighbor is looking south east, a huge bright white/blueish flash went off above the tree and a ray of light, same color as described, pretty wide ray of light traveled south right after the flash, my neighbor looks south west and sees a craft darting off west. it shook me to the core, it was low, bright flash that lit up the sky, like a flash from a camera. i had goose bumps and got a little scared, it was intense. 

the starlike orb that traveled northeast was in straight line path, no sharp or sudden turns, the flash and ray of light to the south was instantaneous, happened so fast but startling as well. 

the flash of light to the south, i lost sight of it due to the tree, the orb traveling northeast was lost due to distance. 

i've seen plenty of ufo's this past year with my neighbor as a witness, back in february or so we saw 2 cloaked ufo's with one being curved to a point from its side with a red light underneath facing west and one above us clearly looks like something distorted the sky, like if it was using mirrors to reflect the light, that was a little nerve wrecking but on the 25th of august, that gave me the chills and goose bumps all over, i was scared, very startled, i can't explain what it was. it was amazing and frighting at the same time.
content.summary: Neighbor and i witnessed orb like star objects then a bright white flash and ray of light followed.

content.detailedDescription: I had been up with my baby daughter who had been very ill for many weeks and doctors couldn't find the cause or a cure. when she dozed off for a short time i stepped outside to have a cigarette and looked up at the sky praying for her to get well. i saw the two spheres approx. 3' above the laundry room bldg. they were small; i thought they were about 18" to 24" in diameter. the laundry room was about 20 feet from my back porch and i stepped out into the yard so i was probably only 15' from the laundry room. i wasn't afraid at all and i watched but didn't want to move because i didn't want to frighten them away. they didn't have lights but were lighter than the sky behind them. the closest thing i can describe them as is that they looked like fish eggs with light coming from behind them. the edges were darker than the centers. one was slightly above and in front of the other. this one began to slowly move upward and the second one followed also very slowly. then they just zipped away toward the east and disappeared behind some trees. there was no sound, no actual lights, no disturbance at all. i almost felt like they weren't craft but living things. i have told people over the years but they think i must have been seeing things or that i'm crazy.  i have never seen any other reports of objects like the ones i saw. this is why i finally decided to ask if you have ever had any similar reports especially around the same time that i saw the two objects. i'd like to know if anyone else has seen something similar and know what i saw before i die.
content.summary: 2 spheres above building, 20' from me. slowly moved up together then took off super fast

content.detailedDescription:
In june 1980, my parents were driving me to a community theater rehearsal at the former nike base on lakeview road in hamburg, ny. i was only 17 when i witnessed this event from the back seat of my parents' car. we were near the intersection of lakeview road and route 20. we should have been facing west, but in my recollection of the event our vehicle was pointing east. i can not piece together why our car was oriented in the wrong direction to the rehearsal site.
an intense bright light in the approximate shape of a diamond to circle appeared right in front of our car, hovering just above the power lines. the lights were radiant, and the source of the light was totally silent. i was very frightened. i don't believe that what we were seeing was a helicopter because of the silence. i begged my father to drive away from the light source. the next thing i recall was seeing the object moving rapidly in a bizarre pattern which appeared to be miles away from us.
my parents could not recall the event. my father laughed and dismissed my concerns.
when i arrived to rehearsal building,  i quickly ran to the window facing east, southeast and saw three bright lights at a distance moving in odd, irregular patterns. another person entered the rehearsal hall and told the cast he had just seen ufos. the cast thought we were pranking them. the other witness and i watched the lights from the window for maybe less than five minutes and then the lights abruptly vanished.
content.summary: Intense diamond/circle radiant white light emanating from hovering object about maybe 15' wide above vehicle

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i stept out at 1050pm to get some air. we both noticed to the west a glowing sphere. it was producing white, green, red, and blue colors in a rapid way. it hovered for about a minute then started going up and down rather fast. it at times disappeared then reappeared fast. a aircraft moving to the north appeared and the sphere vanished. once the aircraft left our view it reappeared . the sighting lasted about five minutes, and vanished. my wife and i were dumbfounded at what we saw, and felt lucky to see it, and talked about it for some time.
content.summary: Glowing multiple lights, was one object, going up and down fast

content.detailedDescription: i would like to type out my report, save it and then tomorrow proof read it before submitting it but there doesn't seem to be a way of saving.
content.summary: Large orange ball

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there.
     my name is jamey kincer. i live in dripping springs texas. one of
seven dark sky communities in america. im not sure if this is the
reason we see so many things here but none the less we do. i have
always been a sky watcher but recently since myself and my 2 kids
moved in here about a year ago its been unusual to say the least. we
have watched many many ufos streaking or pulsing or wobbling across
our sky but we started noticing a pattern, then things got a lot more
personal. we noticed that almost all the craft were disappearing
around the same location in the sky.
all of my attempts to capture these have not worked out. i just dont
have the capabilities i should yet! sorry!
heres the wierd part...My girlfriend(who we live with as it is her
house) is not a believer in anyway. the other night out in the jaccuzi
star gazing like we always do i noticed a bright white light in the
sky some distance away and jokingly took out my cell phone and set my
light to setting 6 and shined it up at it.... about 5 minutes later we
noticed a very similar bright white light about the size of a golf
ball on the edge of our yard circling towards the jaccuzi....We joked
and said holy cow it came in for a closeup....After 10 seconds it
pused about 6 feet from us we about jumped out of our skin...Not even
1 second after we were seeing this a bright whi9te light lit uo the
jaccuzi we were now hanging over the edge in, and not the ground in
front of us at all....We instinctively looked up and both saw the same
thing....A massive massive craft going about 100ft over our house and
was cigar/ovalish shaped with two diamond shaped sets of wings, one
front and one back. it made no noise and disappeared about 300 ft
passed the house.
she was so scared and confused that she now wants me to do this
here....Tell someone.
this is not the only instance either... like i said we see ufos all
the time here....But that started the series of sightings and events
leading up to my kids telling me about weird lights outside their
windows.
i dont think you directly can help us at least get some proof we arent
crazy but maybe this is the first step to getting in contact with
someone interested enough to try.
thank you for all the awesome reporting and job yall do. thx for
putting up with one helluva letter. any reply is already greatly
appreciated.
thx and be blessed
j
content.summary: Jd} i couldnt possibly desribe this event in 25 words or less.

content.detailedDescription: While outdoors sitting in a hot tub (no alcohol, no drugs) at about 9pm cst on tuesday august 27, 2014, observed a bright white search light scan the sky twice above waukegan memorial airport in lake county, il. about 2-3 minutes later, observed an orange-yellow oval craft travel from w to e at a high rate of speed (1200-1800 mph) for 5-10 seconds, then blink out (off). oval shaped craft was at an altitude of about 30k feet and vibrated or fluctuated slightly and was not traveling in a straight line. the craft traveled in a slight downward arc, then blinked off. this was not a meteor, nor other type of space debris. (years earlier, observed space debris fall to earth with a bluish burning light). this oval craft was observed by my wife, simultaneously. no sound, nor rocket engine noise. it appeared to travel along the nearby il-wi border from west to east out over lake michigan. it did not land or crash or travel downward, just a slight downward arc, then vanished. craft speed was about 4-5 times faster than a commercial airliner seen regularly between butch o'hare airport (ord) and general mitchell field in milwaukee. the oval craft was orange-yellow and changed direction (fluctuated) as it streaked through the night sky. there were no clouds or vapor in the atmosphere. stars and planets shined brightly, sunset at about 7pm cst. i would to think the oval craft was one of ours (military, cia, experimental, etc.), but have serious doubts. no film, no video.
content.summary: Ufo over wadsworth, il traveled nw to ne at high rate of speed, blinked out

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Walking dog, when noticed out of the corner of my eye a blinding light. it appeared to be reflecting the sun significantly. when i focused in on the object it seemed oddly shaped, small, and moving slowly with no noise. i paused and continued to focus watching until it was beyond the tree line. it had a reminiscent shape of looking like a silver pinball.

definitely not a helicopter, balloon, or plane.
content.summary: Blinding metal ball like shape

content.detailedDescription:
During my shift, patroling on county road 2570 going to county road 833 at approximately 8:47 pm  headed sw driving 35 miles per hour, i noticed from my left a huge and very b
10000
right white light i immediately thought wow when did this new tower get installed. i stared at this huge very bright white light so i pulled the truck off the road and parked it. this huge very bright object went up and traveled slowly to my right. i then heard this jet like noise that ended as quickly as it started. i put the truck in gear went down to county road 833 and turned around by this time it was coming back to the spot i had first noticed it. i parked the truck and kept watching this is when i noticed the lights on top. they went from one side to the other and had a rhythm in it's own pace the object took off toward the south and completely disappeared as quickly as i noticed it to begin with. i was in amazement. this is a space craft a ufo. i just saw a ufo and i could not believe what i had just seen much less how close it was to me. it scared me to putting that truck in gear and hauling it straight back to my job site. i told coworker and i just kept going on and on about it. took me about three hours to settle down and particularly did not want to get back in the truck and go anywhere period. that ufo just went poof gone just disappeared..... it has completely changed my way of thinking and i don't trust the sky. i see  them all over the sky. even when i told people what i have seen they think i have lost it..... no,,, ufo's are very real and many are here. so... next day going back to work i saw that the place the ufo was hovering over is power lines from the power plant. they are every where out there. i saw another last night going off in a straight line and disappeared just like poof it's gone. i was so stunned i did not get my phone to take a picture either but i know what i saw and it has changed my everything about the sky
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very huge bright white light with lights on top of it they had a ray them like movement and it just disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived home from a cruise . i parked my car in my yard talking to my friend on the phone . i was in a deep conversation when i relised a ufo in the sky . so i told my friend in the exact words hey bro i got to let u go i see something crazy in the sky. at first i was a little bit of a skeptic until i witnessed this incident. . . .I grew up in grants new mexico as most of u know where one of the most popular ufo sighting in usa crash land in roswell i have been there but i'm goin to go on with my story. so i hung my phone up i jumped out my car and the first thing i did was to pull out my phone and start to record, i started to yell so my family to come outside to see this incredible phenomenon, as i kept yelling i noticed the ufos i was recording was in a stop sign shape about 6 or 7 of them all in one place. as i began to record my video i noticed that the ufos started to move incredibly fast switching spot's like if they where dancing. . . as all of this was happening i was screaming for my dad . . my little niece's came i have 3 nieces one of them is 14 other one is 6 and other one is 7 the oldest one was like cool uncle what is that and i answered a"ufo" my littler nieces were frightened to what we are encountering. . .Then my dad arrived as my sister arrived and they all witnessed it as well as they where on camera astonished of what's happening in front of there eyes. the ufos stopped dancing as i would called it and all left in a formal formation southwest over the zuni mountains. . .I live right by a air port and right by a national forest called the zuni mountains . . i hope to here from u guy's and show u more proof of my video i wrote all this so i can show someone my video but a funny thing after all this had happened i called the police and they just laughed at me but hope to hear from u guys
 
 
 i don't know how to attach it i have the video on my galaxy tablet because i took my memory card out of my phone and put it in there so i would like for a investigator to come over so i can tell them more and show them my video and hive it to u guys
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 5 to 6 light in like a stop sign shape

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I and some of my family have seen these orb shaped solid light flying in the sky, i have seen them them over 20 times. the last one i saw was the lowest flying one i have seen, hard to say how low it was but it struck me that there was no sound. i have seen one make a u-turn in the past, usually they are very high in the sky. the could be mistaken easily for stars until you observe them moving in a steady motion. 

i recorded one on my phone but it looks like nothing, you can barely see it.
content.summary: Orb, looks like a star but then it moves

content.detailedDescription: Alien like figure shaped like a human but invisible in the naked eye the flash of my camera caught the figure that was seen only in the photo walking upside down in the air
content.summary: Alien like figure in the air walking upside down

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting on her deck drinking coffee.  she said, "look!" i looked up in time to see a rectangular shaped object with lights circling around it, changing colors. we kept saying, "what is that?"  it briefly went totally dark and then reappeared moving toward her property.  her house is situated at an elevation of 1,053 feet above sea level according to my phone.  there is a very steep drop off at the edge of her lawn which is heavily wooded all the way down the mountain.  these objects were high above the trees which are very tall.  as the large object moved closer and closer to us a small semi-circular shaped object was see below the larger object.  i grabbed my cell phone and began taking photos of what we were seeing.  it came close enough to her lawn to reflect light onto the grass.  then the semi-circular shaped object straightened itself out, as is seen in the photo, and flew at a speed i've never seen anything move with out of our sight behind trees.  it did not return that we saw.  the large object began getting very bright with almost fiery looking lights shooting out of the ring where the multi-colored lights were first observed.  we watched it for what seemed like a short period of time but we later realized we had been out there watching for about an hour and a half. i have no direct memory of the object leaving or blinking out but it was just gone.  i began to take photos all around in hopes of finding where it went.  that's when i got the very poor photo of what seems to be two little creatures.  also, strangely enough another glowing light appeared deep down in the woods.   it would brighten when we talked to it and dim and then brighten again on request.  my camera never recorded a photo of this object although i snapped them repeatedly.  my friend said once during watching the object she was going to get a flashlight and go out there and look more closely.  i strongly encouraged her not to do that.  i felt that we were fine on the deck where we were but didn't need to be out there any closer.  we were unnaturally calm afterward and even talked about how we just sauntered back inside the house and went to bed - too calm if you ask me.  odd.
content.summary: On the night of 7/5/14 we observed what seems to have been a ufo.
